üöÄ Partnership Announcement! üéâ InterFET is thrilled to unveil a strategic agreement with Rep One, Inc. a leading sales representation agency, for expanded coverage in the Southeastern US regions. üåç In a significant move highlighting our dedication to growth and market expansion, InterFET and REP ONE are joining forces to cover the states of Alabama, Mississippi, Tennessee, Florida, Georgia, North Carolina, and South Carolina. üíº This partnership brings together two industry powerhouses renowned for their commitment to excellence and a proven track record in driving top-tier sales performance. üåü InterFET's unwavering focus on innovation and providing JFET solutions to industries worldwide, from military & aerospace to medical and instrumentation, is complemented by REP ONE's formidable presence in the sales representation arena. Their expertise in leading top-performing sales teams and strong relationships with industry players have solidified their position as a trusted partner known for delivering outstanding results. Alan Bennett, Director of Sales & Marketing at InterFET, shared his excitement, stating, "We are excited to join forces with REP ONE to extend our reach and drive growth across the Southeastern US regions. This partnership not only allows us to tap into REP ONE's exceptional sales leadership capabilities but also enhances our ability to deliver value to our clients and stakeholders." For more information about InterFET and its products, please visit https://www.interfet.com/ or contact sales@interfet.com About REP ONE: With an unwavering focus on growth and expansion, REP ONE brings together a wealth of expertise and experience in effectively leading a top-performing sales team. Their outstanding reputation with key industry players ‚Äì including principals, customers, and distributors ‚Äì forms a powerhouse team that commands respect and recognition throughout the industry. #InterFET #REPONE #Partnership #Expansion #SoutheasternUS #SalesRepresentation #ElectronicComponents #SystemSolutions #TrustedPartner #SalesPerformance #IndustryLeadership #instrumentation

In today's press release, we announce that HPQ's France-based affiliate, Novacium SAS, recently acquired cutting-edge battery testing equipment. It'll substantially enhance our research and development capabilities. It's a TOB-BTS-5V6A analyzer and is now fully operational in the company's Solaize laboratory. This advanced equipment will enable us to comprehensively analyze various Lithium battery formats, from button to the larger 21700 cylindrical batteries. One key advantage of this acquisition is the increased self-sufficiency it provides. By reducing our dependency on external laboratories, we can accelerate our testing processes and obtain critical data much faster and more efficiently. This speeds up our development cycles and significantly cuts costs associated with external validation, reassuring our commitment to cost-effectiveness. Investing in high-precision testing equipment is crucial for advancing the development of future generations of silicon-based materials. We are thrilled about the potential of this new capacity and are confident that it will drive innovation and excellence at HPQ Silicon Inc. further solidifying our position in the market. Find a link to the press release in the comments below. ++++++ #BatteryTechnology #LithiumIon #Equipement

Choosing Your EMS Partner: The Key to Manufacturing Success Selecting the right Electronic Manufacturing Services (EMS) provider is a strategic decision that shapes the trajectory of your products and business. At Cygnus Electronics, we understand the gravity of this choice and offer the essential qualities that epitomize an ideal EMS partner: üîé Diverse Capabilities : Our extensive range of services ensures all your needs are met under one roof. üèÖ Quality Commitment : With our ISO 9001:2008 certification, quality isn't just claimed; it's certified. ü§ñ Technological Edge : State-of-the-art manufacturing technology is the cornerstone of our operations. üîÑ Supply Chain Mastery : We navigate component complexities with a robust supply chain network. üìà Scalability & Flexibility : Adapting to your evolving needs is part of our ethos. üì¢ Transparent Communication : Expect proactive updates and responsive support. üí° Financial Reliability : Our stability translates to consistent, long-term support for your projects. üåø Eco-Conscious Manufacturing : Sustainability is integral to our processes, mirroring your commitment to the environment. üõ†Ô∏è After-Sales Assurance : Post-production support ensures your continued satisfaction. Choosing Cygnus Electronics means partnering with an EMS provider that's dedicated to your product's excellence from prototype to post-sale. Let's connect and craft success together. #EMS #ElectronicManufacturing #PartnerWithConfidence #CygnusElectronics #Innovation #SupplyChainExcellence #Sustainability --- *For a detailed guide on selecting the perfect EMS partner and to learn more about our services, visit our latest blog post. https://lnkd.in/gXKSzfEb

* BUYER PROOF SALES* , What does it mean? How to improve the quality and maturity of interaction from sales towards & with procurement ? How to move from contract/sla & price to a solid relationship with impact on all performance areas: FINANCE (total cost, revenue & cash) VALUE (performance, sustainability, innovation) RISK (supply risk, market risk) Connection CRM to SRM in a professional way ito create business cases with impact, progress workshops & fact based negotiations to strengthen the collaboration resulting in business Improvement on both sides of the table. #solvint #isam #sales #buyerproof #procurement #salestraining #inkoop #verkoop #salesmanagement #learninganddevelopment #salesdirector

The MASTECH team recently made a significant visit to our distributors from the CIS in October 2023, unveiling an impressive array of new products and applications, innovations, and standards. During this visit, the team not only showcased these new offerings but also provided comprehensive sales and technical training to our partners. SDS, Chip&Dip, Mars Components, and Shtautinger are some of the distributors visited by the MASTECH team. CIS area can anticipate a wave of over 60 exciting products soon, ranging from cutting-edge digital multimeters to digital clamp meters and environmental meters. Here‚Äôs a sneak peek at what‚Äôs coming: - Digital Multimeters - Digital Clamp Meters - Wire Tracker Transmitters - Infrared Thermometers - Thermometers - Hygrometers - Moisture Meters - Digital Light Meters - Digital Anemometers - Sound Level Meters - Gas Leak Detectors - Socket Testers - Tachometers - Laser Distance Meters "But it wasn‚Äôt just about the products. Our team engaged in insightful discussions on various exciting topics and took the opportunity to establish personal connections. Additionally, we explored potential collaborations with new resellers, paving the way for promising business prospects", explains Maria Kshatriya, Sales Manager for the CIS region. Stay tuned for these cutting-edge innovations, soon to be available in the CIS market, promising to elevate standards and redefine possibilities in the field. #mastech #newproducts
